Pre-Game Insights: Hosts India will be in action on Thursday as World Cup action returns to the Wankhede stadium.
India will play in Mumbai in a 50-over World Cup match for the first time since lifting the trophy at the venue in 2011.
A win on Thursday would ensure India qualifying for the semis.
Sri Lanka have had a disappointing outing thus far in the tournament, placed seventh on the points table, with two wins in six matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between India and Sri Lanka will be played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.
The ICC ODI World Cup 2023 game between India and Sri Lanka is scheduled to kickstart at 14:00 IST (+5:30 GMT).
Star Sports Network has acquired the rights to broadcast the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
The live streaming of the game between India and Sri Lanka will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
